name: Lesson 1: Holding the Pick and Basic Guitar Techniques
shortDescription: In this lesson, you will learn how to hold the pick correctly and basic techniques for playing the guitar. The video will guide you on how to use the pick, different strumming styles, and how to produce the best sound from your guitar.
target: How to hold the pick correctly
How to produce a good sound from the guitar
detailLearn: Holding the Pick: A detailed guide on how to hold the pick for comfort and control.
Strumming Techniques: Different strumming styles such as upstrokes, downstrokes, and how to combine them.
Sound Production: How to adjust your strumming force to create the best sound from the guitar.

name: Lesson 2: Alternate Picking Techniques
shortDescription: In this lesson, you will learn the fundamentals of alternate picking, focusing on the importance of maintaining an up and down motion while playing.
detailLearn: Alternate Picking: Learn the technique of alternating between upstrokes and downstrokes.
String Switching: Practice switching strings after a downward motion with an upward motion.
String Skipping: Get accustomed to skipping strings to prepare for playing songs.

name: Lesson 3: Pressing the Fretboard
shortDescription: Learn how to press the strings correctly to produce clear sounds.
detailLearn: Finger Placement: Learn how to position your fingers on the fretboard for optimal sound.
Sound Clarity: Techniques to ensure your notes ring clearly without buzzing.
Strength Building: Exercises to strengthen your fingers for better control.

name: Lesson 4: Learning the 1-2-3-4 Exercise
shortDescription: Combine both hands in this exercise to improve finger strength and coordination.
detailLearn: Exercise Overview: Learn the '1 2 3 4' exercise to develop finger independence.
Fretboard Navigation: Practice moving across the fretboard while maintaining proper technique.
Timing Practice: Focus on playing in time and gradually increasing speed.

name: Lesson 5: Moving the 1-2-3-4 Exercise
shortDescription: Expand your skills by moving the 1-2-3-4 exercise across the fretboard, improving speed and accuracy.
detailLearn: Fretboard Movement: Learn to navigate the fretboard smoothly while playing the '1 2 3 4' exercise.
Speed Development: Exercises to increase your speed without sacrificing accuracy.
Timing Control: Practice maintaining a steady rhythm while moving.

name: Lesson 6: Vibrato
shortDescription: Learn how to perform vibrato on the electric guitar and improve finger movement for smoother transitions.
detailLearn: Vibrato Basics: Learn the fundamentals of vibrato and its importance in guitar playing.
Finger Control: Exercises to enhance finger control for smoother vibrato.
Expressive Playing: Techniques to incorporate vibrato into your playing for emotional impact.

name: Lesson 7: Vibrato
shortDescription: Learn how to move your fingers up and down to create smoother sounds (slide). Gradually transition from using three fingers to one finger for slide.
detailLearn: Vibrato Basics: Learn the fundamentals of vibrato and its importance in guitar playing.
Finger Control: Exercises to enhance finger control for smoother vibrato.
Expressive Playing: Techniques to incorporate vibrato into your playing for emotional impact.

name: Lesson 8: Hammer On
shortDescription: Master the hammer-on technique to improve your speed and fluidity on the guitar.
detailLearn: Hammer-On Basics: Learn how to execute a hammer-on effectively.
Speed Exercises: Practice drills to increase your finger speed.
Transition Techniques: Tips for making smooth transitions between notes.

name: Lesson 9: Hammer On 2
shortDescription: Phối hợp kĩ năng hammer on với bài tập và tempo, học cách kiểm soát tay khi hammer on để đúng nhịp.
target: Hiểu biết về kỹ thuật hammer on
Cải thiện khả năng kiểm soát tay
detailLearn: Cơ bản về Hammer On: Học cách thực hiện kỹ thuật hammer on một cách hiệu quả.
Bài tập tốc độ: Thực hành các bài tập để tăng tốc độ ngón tay.
Kỹ thuật chuyển tiếp: Mẹo để tạo ra các chuyển tiếp mượt mà giữa các nốt.

name: Lesson 10: Combining Techniques
shortDescription: Learn to combine various techniques learned in intermediate lessons and improve your rhythmic accuracy while using these techniques.
detailLearn: Technique Integration: Learn how to blend different techniques into your playing.
Rhythm Practice: Exercises to improve your timing and rhythm.
Performance Tips: Strategies for enhancing your overall guitar performance.
